Text: Only $22.9 billion, or about 8 percent, was held in 529 prepaid tuition plans. Their lower popularity may be attributable to their lower flexibility and availability compared with 529 savings plans.
Cause: Their lower popularity may be attributable to their lower flexibility and availability compared with 529 savings plans.
Effect: Only $22.9 billion, or about 8 percent, was held in 529 prepaid tuition plans.
Sentence: <e2>Only $22.9 billion, or about 8 percent, was held in 529 prepaid tuition plans.</e2> <e1>Their lower popularity may be attributable to their lower flexibility and availability compared with 529 savings plans.</e1>
